about_the_game:
Step into the magical world of Elemental Raiders, where you engage in strategic turn-based battles and cast powerful spells to conquer arenas.

Assemble your team of Elemental Magic Heroes, harness unique spells, and conquer adversaries in pulse-pounding PvP Spell Arenas and intense RPG turn-based raids.

Deep Tactical Gameplay:
Dive into intense RPG turn-based combat with intuitive mechanics, where every decision strategically impacts the battle's outcome.

Elemental Heroes:
Discover more than 50 Heroes, and each one possesses a unique set of perks and a powerful Ultimate Spell. Customize your heroes and build your ultimate team to dominate PvP arenas and PvE raids.



Master Magic Spells:
Command over 135 unique spells shape the battlefield dynamics. From devastating attacks to strategic defenses, tailor your tactics with elemental Water, Fire, and Nature spells.



Dynamic PvP Spell Arena:
Test your skills in thrilling live battles against other players. Ascend the ranks as you conquer arenas, unlock new heroes, and showcase your mastery in combat mechanics.

Epic Single-Player Campaign:
Face the Evil Titans in high-stakes single-player raids. Overcome challenges to win powerful chests and discover new magic spells.



Leaderboard Ascent:
Climb the leaderboard, earn trophies, and unlock increasingly generous rewards each season, celebrating your achievements.

Esports Ready:
Thrive in competition at regular esports tournaments. Exhibit your RPG and strategic talents on a grand stage and gain recognition as a top Fantasy Wizard.

Community and Competitions:
Join an active community, exchange strategies, and participate in esports tournaments. Whether you're building alliances or competing globally, there’s a place for you in Elemental Raiders.

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X v10.6 (Snow Leopard)
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Hardware 3D Accelerated graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Hardware 3D Accelerated graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad core 2.6GHz x86-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
